feed.title: SAP Community - PLM EAM/Plant Maintenance

entry.title: External Refurbishment balance not showing zero after settlement
entry.content:
Hi Team,

We are using external refurbishment process and we are refurbishing 

Refurbished a material from valuation type C(Defective) to valuation type B(refurbished).

B Refurbished Moving Average Price 200 Stock 1

C  Defective Moving Average Price 100 Stock 1

Price of service 50

Now after settlement why the balance on cost elements description (Equipment 3P and Pipes/Valves/Fittings/3P) is not showing zero

entry.title: Functional Location Structure Indicator Issue while data loading
entry.content:
While Functional Location data loading from Migration cockpit, It is found that structure indicator found different in table level from the template file. what will be the possible cause. I have checked format of the level which is ok. Is there any configuration missing.

 

Pl guide

entry.title: How to add fields to LSMW Standard Batch Input
entry.content:
Hi All,

I am using a already created LSMW - Standard Batch Input with Object 0480 (FnctnlLoc TaskList), and need to add two custom fields.

The fields are added in source structure at 'Maintain Source Fields' level, but can not be mapped because they don't exist in the IBIPTLOP structure (that is in relation to my source structure) at 'Maintain Field Mapping and Conversion Rules' level.

The two new fields are already displayed in IA11 in the table view for 'General Operation Overview', but after running the LSMW they are empty.

How can these additional fields be filled via LSMW with Standard Batch Input method?

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: Disturbing the default configs given for 1710 plant in s4hana practice server by PM MM FICO users
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Request the SAP Server to freeze the default configs given in the practice server of S4HANA for the plant 1710. Users are not copying the default configs rather disturbing the default configs. Because of which all the integration of modules with MM & FICO are getting disturbed and practicing users from  other modules like PP, EAM are getting suffered creating lot of errors & fixing those errors related to MM & FICO particularly wasting the entire practice time of PP & EAM users.

Request SAP Server Team to please act on this issue & ensure that the default configs for the plant 1710 in the practice server are not disturbed creating ease of access & understanding of functionality by the users if the process is done error free. 

Thanks & please do the needful

entry.title: The estimate cost field USER4 in AUFK or CAUFV table not updating
entry.content:
Dear experts,

I am facing an issue with Estimated Cost not getting updated in AUFK or CAUFV table. I am describing the issue below:

We have an enhancement where we are copying the planned cost to the order header estimated cost (USER4) field during the order Release if the estimated cost is blank. The value is getting populated correctly under the order header frontend but if I am checking the table AUFK or CAUFV the USER4 field value is blank and impacting the order report.

How to update the USER4 field value in AUFK or CAUFV table or are there any FM or other tables which stores this value. My first assumption is that SAP locks any update on the estimate cost field USER4 post Release status. Any suggestions are most welcome.

Thanks,

Rahul

entry.title: Linear Asset Management - Charcterstic Value And Description Geryed Out
entry.content:
Dear SAP experts ,

I am facing an issue in the linear asset management i have done all the configuration that are needed for maintaining of linear asset and also activated the business functions LOG_EAM_LINEAR_1 , LOG_EAM_LINEAR_2 and also LOG_EAM_CI_1.
And also created class and charcterstics for both the equipment and functional location in sap pm but while creating the equipment and functional location i am unable to enter the charcterstic name and charcterstic value in the equipment as well as in functional location too.

 

Here i am unable to enter the charcterstic name and charcterstic value as they are grey out how to enable them is there any configuration or any business functions apart from mentioned above needs to be activated?

Regards,
Neeraj

entry.title: Need Clarification on the Role of SAP CS in the Context of SAP PM, Given the Presence of SAP SD
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I’m currently working with SAP PM and came across the SAP CS module. From what I understand, SAP SD already handles customer-related sales processes.

My question is:

  • In a PM context, when and why would we use SAP CS instead of (or in addition to) SAP SD?

  • Are there scenarios where CS is essential for handling customer-related service processes that SD alone cannot cover?

I’d appreciate insights, real examples, or references from your experience to better understand the necessity and added value of SAP CS in this context.

Thanks in advance for your guidance!

entry.title: Looking for Real-World Scenarios for Using Multiple Cycle Maintenance Plans in SAP PM
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I’m exploring the use of Multiple Cycle Maintenance Plans in SAP PM and would like to understand in which situations they are most effective.

From what I know, multiple cycle plans allow scheduling based on different maintenance cycles within a single plan, but I would like to learn:

  • What are all possible real-world scenarios where multiple cycle plans are preferred over single cycle plans?

entry.title: Difference in Call Behavior Between Single-Cycle Plan and Multiple-Counter Plan
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I created both a single-cycle maintenance plan and a multiple-counter maintenance plan, each with:

  • The same cycle: 3 months

  • The same start date: 11.08.2024

However, the results were different:

  • In the single-cycle plan, the system generated all the old work orders as expected.

  • In the multiple-counter plan, only one work order was generated.

Could someone explain the logic behind this difference in SAP’s scheduling behavior?

Thank you in advance for your insights.

Best regards,

entry.title: How to check error logs for CATS when transferred to PM or CO database
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I need you help in doing one analysis. I am describing the issue below:

We are posting the timesheet in CATS where the receiver is a PM order and then via a batch job we are transferring it to PM and CO data base but somehow the batch job got failed. The batch job only shows that it has been failed and no more error details. Due to this there are no entries in PM or CO while entries are displaying under the CATS time display and its database tables. I am wondering as we tick the 'Log (PM/HR/CO/PS)' box (refer attached screenshot) under the program variant (RCATSTAL), SAP should be saving these logs somewhere in the database. I have checked SLG1, IW46, COFC and CN30 but no luck.

Would be great if someone can advise.

Thanks,

Rahul

entry.title: SAP EHS integation to PM - Task List and PRT not showing up when adding control
entry.content:

entry.title: How to activate safety relevance field on Task List - EHS integration with PM
entry.content:
There is safety relevance field that is greyed out that we can't change or access. Along with that the safety tab on the Task List shows operations but we can't assign any safety measures to it. 

 

How to use these fields? We have done all the config on EHS and PM side.

entry.title: Find Maintenance Orders
entry.content: Does anyone know what the specific criteria for the search fields "Outstanding Purchasing", "Outstanding Reservations" and "Outstanding Services" to be marked "Yes" are? Seems straight forward but when we test it we see inconsistent results

entry.title: How to mass change technical objects in S4 Public cloud
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Need suggestion how to perform Mass Change in Technical Objects (Equipment and Functional Location).

There is an App named Find Technical Object but it has restriction to select only 20 records at a time.

I am looking for a mass update, example for materials there is one app named Manage Mass Maintenance Products where we can actually update the whole master records by searching and selecting on Table Level and also it has provision to update associated class and characterstics.

 

Please let me know is there any way to do the same for technical objects, any help will be valuable.

 

Thanks
